page.title: 10NAPIER COLLEGE EDINBURGH
page.content: NAPIER COLLEGE of science and technology was opened in 1964 at Merchiston providing courses mainly in the areas of science and technology and in 1968 the Edinburgh college of commerce opened at Sighthill providing courses in business studies and management.In 1974 the two colleges merged to form a single establishment, Napier college of commerce and technology.There are also centres at Craiglockhart, Marchmont, Spylaw Road and North Merchiston.It is also good for sport such as-squash,climbing wall , badminton, volleyball, hockey, judo, table-tennis, fencing golf, multigym and it has a lot of outdoor facilities NAPIER COLLEGE offers students the opportunity to study on a wide range of courses.An old house has been neatly restored and forms a focal point inside the Campus.
